title: Newfoundland and Labrador community infections are 'sombre messages': premier - CTV News
description: Newfoundland and Labrador community infections are 'sombre messages': premier CTV News Coronavirus outbreak: Newfoundland sees 1st community spread cases in province Global News Dwight Ball warns of 'economic crisis' looming after COVID-19 emergency CBC.ca Co…
content: HALIFAX Newfoundland and Labrador s premier is calling the latest figures on COVID in his province sombre messages as health officials say they weren t able to identify the source of transmission in several new cases Dwight Ball was the sole Atla chars
